title: Granite Design add dual-mode Cricket Bell and Scope Mount for SWAT Users
content:
Granite Design have added two very small but very useful items to their portfolio. The Cricket Bell is an under-bar mounted bike bell that has two modes; a continuous “cowbell” mode and a single hit “ding” mode. There’s also a new quick-release cycle computer mount that replaces the top-cap of the SWAT tool system. Let’s […]
